name: CABGSurgeries
title: CABG Surgeries
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of coronary artery bypass graft (CABG) procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a procedure for coronary artery bypass graft (CABG) surgery.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent a  coronary artery bypass graft (CABG) performed using a scope.)
